Header: North Korean projectiles believed to be short-range ballistic missiles – Kyodo
Content: The North Korean projectiles launched early Friday are believed to be short-range ballistic missiles, Kyodo News reported, citing unnamed Japanese government officials.South Korea’s military said earlier that unidentified short-range projectiles were fired at 2:59 a.m. and 3:23 a.m. local time from North Korea’s South Hamgyong Province into the East Sea, the North’s third launch in just over week.
